00044 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_MDS

00046 #include <obd.h>

00053 const char orph_index_name[] = "PENDING";
00054 static const char dotdot[] = "..";
00055 
00056 enum {
00057         ORPH_OP_UNLINK,
00058         ORPH_OP_TRUNCATE
00059 };
00060 
00061 #define ORPHAN_FILE_NAME_FORMAT         "%016llx:%08x:%08x:%2x"
00062 #define ORPHAN_FILE_NAME_FORMAT_18      "%llx:%08x"
00063 
00064 static struct dt_key* orph_key_fill(const struct lu_env *env,
00065                                     const struct lu_fid *lf, __u32 op)
00066 {
00067         char *key = mdd_env_info(env)->mti_key;
00068         int rc;
00069 
00070         LASSERT(key);
00071         rc = snprintf(key, NAME_MAX + 1, ORPHAN_FILE_NAME_FORMAT,
00072                       (long long unsigned int)fid_seq(lf),
00073                       fid_oid(lf), fid_ver(lf), op);
00074         if (rc > 0)
00075                 return (struct dt_key*) key;
00076         else
00077                 return ERR_PTR(rc);
00078 }
00079 
00080 static struct dt_key* orph_key_fill_18(const struct lu_env *env,
00081                                        const struct lu_fid *lf)
00082 {
00083         char *key = mdd_env_info(env)->mti_key;
00084         int rc;
00085 
00086         LASSERT(key);
00087         rc = snprintf(key, NAME_MAX + 1, ORPHAN_FILE_NAME_FORMAT_18,
00088                       (unsigned long long)fid_seq(lf), fid_oid(lf));
00089         if (rc > 0)
00090                 return (struct dt_key*) key;
00091         else
00092                 return ERR_PTR(rc);
00093 }
00094 
00095 static inline void mdd_orphan_write_lock(const struct lu_env *env,
00096                                          struct mdd_device *mdd)
00097 {
00098         struct dt_object *dor = mdd->mdd_orphans;
00099         dt_write_lock(env, dor, MOR_TGT_ORPHAN);
00100 }
00101 
00102 static inline void mdd_orphan_write_unlock(const struct lu_env *env,
00103                                            struct mdd_device *mdd)
00104 {
00105         struct dt_object *dor = mdd->mdd_orphans;
00106         dt_write_unlock(env, dor);
00107 }
00108 
00109 static inline int mdd_orphan_insert_obj(const struct lu_env *env,
00110                                         struct mdd_device *mdd,
00111                                         struct mdd_object *obj,
00112                                         __u32 op, struct thandle *th)
00113 {
00114         struct dt_insert_rec    *rec    = &mdd_env_info(env)->mti_dt_rec;
00115         struct dt_object        *dor    = mdd->mdd_orphans;
00116         const struct lu_fid     *lf     = mdo2fid(obj);
00117         struct dt_key           *key    = orph_key_fill(env, lf, op);
00118 
00119         rec->rec_fid = lf;
00120         rec->rec_type = mdd_object_type(obj);
00121 
00122         return dt_insert(env, dor, (const struct dt_rec *)rec, key, th, 1);
00123 }
00124 
00125 static inline int mdd_orphan_delete_obj(const struct lu_env *env,
00126                                         struct mdd_device  *mdd ,
00127                                         struct dt_key *key,
00128                                         struct thandle *th)
00129 {
00130         struct dt_object *dor = mdd->mdd_orphans;
00131 
00132         return dt_delete(env, dor, key, th);
00133 }
00134 
00135 static inline int mdd_orphan_ref_add(const struct lu_env *env,
00136                                      struct mdd_device *mdd,
00137                                      struct thandle *th)
00138 {
00139         struct dt_object *dor = mdd->mdd_orphans;
00140         return dt_ref_add(env, dor, th);
00141 }
00142 
00143 static inline int mdd_orphan_ref_del(const struct lu_env *env,
00144                                      struct mdd_device *mdd,
00145                                      struct thandle *th)
00146 {
00147         struct dt_object *dor = mdd->mdd_orphans;
00148         return dt_ref_del(env, dor, th);
00149 }

00151 
00152 int orph_declare_index_insert(const struct lu_env *env,
00153                               struct mdd_object *obj,
00154                               umode_t mode, struct thandle *th)
00155 {
00156         struct dt_insert_rec    *rec = &mdd_env_info(env)->mti_dt_rec;
00157         struct mdd_device       *mdd = mdo2mdd(&obj->mod_obj);
00158         struct dt_key           *key;
00159         int                     rc;
00160 
00161         key = orph_key_fill(env, mdo2fid(obj), ORPH_OP_UNLINK);
00162 
00163         rec->rec_fid = mdo2fid(obj);
00164         rec->rec_type = mode;
00165         rc = dt_declare_insert(env, mdd->mdd_orphans,
00166                                (const struct dt_rec *)rec, key, th);
00167         if (rc != 0)
00168                 return rc;
00169 
00170         rc = mdo_declare_ref_add(env, obj, th);
00171         if (rc)
00172                 return rc;
00173 
00174         if (!S_ISDIR(mode))
00175                 return 0;
00176 
00177         rc = mdo_declare_ref_add(env, obj, th);
00178         if (rc)
00179                 return rc;
00180 
00181         rc = dt_declare_ref_add(env, mdd->mdd_orphans, th);
00182         if (rc)
00183                 return rc;
00184 
00185         rc = mdo_declare_index_delete(env, obj, dotdot, th);
00186         if (rc)
00187                 return rc;
00188 
00189         rc = mdo_declare_index_insert(env, obj,
00190                                       lu_object_fid(&mdd->mdd_orphans->do_lu),
00191                                       S_IFDIR, dotdot, th);
00192 
00193         return rc;
00194 }
00195 
00196 static int orph_index_insert(const struct lu_env *env,
00197                              struct mdd_object *obj,
00198                              __u32 op, struct thandle *th)
00199 {
00200         struct mdd_device       *mdd    = mdo2mdd(&obj->mod_obj);
00201         struct dt_object        *dor    = mdd->mdd_orphans;
00202         const struct lu_fid     *lf_dor = lu_object_fid(&dor->do_lu);
00203         struct dt_object        *next   = mdd_object_child(obj);
00204         struct dt_insert_rec    *rec    = &mdd_env_info(env)->mti_dt_rec;
00205         int                      rc;
00206         ENTRY;
00207 
00208         LASSERT(mdd_write_locked(env, obj) != 0);
00209         LASSERT(!(obj->mod_flags & ORPHAN_OBJ));
00210 
00211         mdd_orphan_write_lock(env, mdd);
00212 
00213         rc = mdd_orphan_insert_obj(env, mdd, obj, op, th);
00214         if (rc)
00215                 GOTO(out, rc);
00216 
00217         mdo_ref_add(env, obj, th);
00218         if (!S_ISDIR(mdd_object_type(obj)))
00219                 GOTO(out, rc = 0);
00220 
00221         mdo_ref_add(env, obj, th);
00222         mdd_orphan_ref_add(env, mdd, th);
00223 
00224         /* try best to fixup directory, dont return errors
00225          * from here */
00226         if (!dt_try_as_dir(env, next))
00227                 GOTO(out, rc = 0);
00228 
00229         dt_delete(env, next, (const struct dt_key *)dotdot, th);
00230 
00231         rec->rec_fid = lf_dor;
00232         rec->rec_type = S_IFDIR;
00233         dt_insert(env, next, (const struct dt_rec *)rec,
00234                   (const struct dt_key *)dotdot, th, 1);
00235 
00236 out:
00237         if (rc == 0)
00238                 obj->mod_flags |= ORPHAN_OBJ;
00239 
00240         mdd_orphan_write_unlock(env, mdd);
00241 
00242         RETURN(rc);
00243 }
00244 
00245 int orph_declare_index_delete(const struct lu_env *env,
00246                               struct mdd_object *obj,
00247 
00248                               struct thandle *th)
00249 {
00250         struct mdd_device *mdd = mdo2mdd(&obj->mod_obj);
00251         struct dt_key     *key;
00252         int                rc;
00253 
00254         key = orph_key_fill(env, mdo2fid(obj), ORPH_OP_UNLINK);
00255 
00256         rc = dt_declare_delete(env, mdd->mdd_orphans, key, th);
00257         if (rc)
00258                 return rc;
00259 
00260         rc = mdo_declare_ref_del(env, obj, th);
00261         if (rc)
00262                 return rc;
00263 
00264         if (S_ISDIR(mdd_object_type(obj))) {
00265                 rc = mdo_declare_ref_del(env, obj, th);
00266                 if (rc)
00267                         return rc;
00268 
00269                 rc = dt_declare_ref_del(env, mdd->mdd_orphans, th);
00270         }
00271 
00272         return rc;
00273 }
00274 
00275 static int orph_index_delete(const struct lu_env *env,
00276                              struct mdd_object *obj,
00277                              __u32 op,
00278                              struct thandle *th)
00279 {
00280         struct mdd_device *mdd = mdo2mdd(&obj->mod_obj);
00281         struct dt_object *dor = mdd->mdd_orphans;
00282         struct dt_key *key;
00283         int rc;
00284 
00285         ENTRY;
00286 
00287         LASSERT(mdd_write_locked(env, obj) != 0);
00288         LASSERT(obj->mod_flags & ORPHAN_OBJ);
00289         LASSERT(obj->mod_count == 0);
00290 
00291         LASSERT(dor);
00292 
00293         key = orph_key_fill(env, mdo2fid(obj), op);
00294         mdd_orphan_write_lock(env, mdd);
00295 
00296         rc = mdd_orphan_delete_obj(env, mdd, key, th);
00297 
00298         if (rc == -ENOENT) {
00299                 key = orph_key_fill_18(env, mdo2fid(obj));
00300                 rc = mdd_orphan_delete_obj(env, mdd, key, th);
00301         }
00302 
00303         if (!rc) {
00304                 /* lov objects will be destroyed by caller */
00305                 mdo_ref_del(env, obj, th);
00306                 if (S_ISDIR(mdd_object_type(obj))) {
00307                         mdo_ref_del(env, obj, th);
00308                         mdd_orphan_ref_del(env, mdd, th);
00309                 }
00310                 obj->mod_flags &= ~ORPHAN_OBJ;
00311         } else {
00312                 CERROR("could not delete object: rc = %d\n",rc);
00313         }
00314 
00315         mdd_orphan_write_unlock(env, mdd);
00316         RETURN(rc);
00317 }
00318 
00319 
00320 static int orphan_object_destroy(const struct lu_env *env,
00321                                  struct mdd_object *obj,
00322                                  struct dt_key *key)
00323 {
00324         struct thandle *th = NULL;
00325         struct mdd_device *mdd = mdo2mdd(&obj->mod_obj);
00326         int rc = 0;
00327         ENTRY;
00328 
00329         th = mdd_trans_create(env, mdd);
00330         if (IS_ERR(th)) {
00331                 CERROR("Cannot get thandle\n");
00332                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(th));
00333         }
00334 
00335         rc = orph_declare_index_delete(env, obj, th);
00336         if (rc)
00337                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00338 
00339         rc = mdo_declare_destroy(env, obj, th);
00340         if (rc)
00341                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00342 
00343         rc = mdd_trans_start(env, mdd, th);
00344         if (rc)
00345                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00346 
00347         mdd_write_lock(env, obj, MOR_TGT_CHILD);
00348         if (likely(obj->mod_count == 0)) {
00349                 mdd_orphan_write_lock(env, mdd);
00350                 rc = mdd_orphan_delete_obj(env, mdd, key, th);
00351                 if (rc == 0) {
00352                         mdo_ref_del(env, obj, th);
00353                         if (S_ISDIR(mdd_object_type(obj))) {
00354                                 mdo_ref_del(env, obj, th);
00355                                 mdd_orphan_ref_del(env, mdd, th);
00356                         }
00357                         rc = mdo_destroy(env, obj, th);
00358                 } else
00359                         CERROR("could not delete object: rc = %d\n",rc);
00360                 mdd_orphan_write_unlock(env, mdd);
00361         }
00362         mdd_write_unlock(env, obj);
00363 
00364 stop:
00365         mdd_trans_stop(env, mdd, 0, th);
00366 
00367         RETURN(rc);
00368 }
00369 
00380 static int orph_key_test_and_del(const struct lu_env *env,
00381                                  struct mdd_device *mdd,
00382                                  struct lu_fid *lf,
00383                                  struct dt_key *key)
00384 {
00385         struct mdd_object *mdo;
00386         int rc;
00387 
00388         mdo = mdd_object_find(env, mdd, lf);
00389 
00390         if (IS_ERR(mdo))
00391                 return PTR_ERR(mdo);
00392 
00393         rc = -EBUSY;
00394         if (mdo->mod_count == 0) {
00395                 CDEBUG(D_HA, "Found orphan "DFID", delete it\n", PFID(lf));
00396                 rc = orphan_object_destroy(env, mdo, key);
00397                 if (rc) /* so replay-single.sh test_37 works */
00398                         CERROR("%s: error unlinking orphan "DFID" from "
00399                                "PENDING: rc = %d\n",
00400                                mdd2obd_dev(mdd)->obd_name, PFID(lf), rc);
00401         } else {
00402                 mdd_write_lock(env, mdo, MOR_TGT_CHILD);
00403                 if (likely(mdo->mod_count > 0)) {
00404                         CDEBUG(D_HA, "Found orphan "DFID" count %d, skip it\n",
00405                                PFID(lf), mdo->mod_count);
00406                         mdo->mod_flags |= ORPHAN_OBJ;
00407                 }
00408                 mdd_write_unlock(env, mdo);
00409         }
00410 
00411         mdd_object_put(env, mdo);
00412         return rc;
00413 }
00414 
00427 static int orph_index_iterate(const struct lu_env *env,
00428                               struct mdd_generic_thread *thread)
00429 {
00430         struct mdd_device *mdd = (struct mdd_device *)thread->mgt_data;
00431         struct dt_object *dor = mdd->mdd_orphans;
00432         struct lu_dirent *ent = &mdd_env_info(env)->mti_ent;
00433         const struct dt_it_ops *iops;
00434         struct dt_it     *it;
00435         struct lu_fid     fid;
00436         int               key_sz = 0;
00437         int               rc;
00438         __u64             cookie;
00439         ENTRY;
00440 
00441         iops = &dor->do_index_ops->dio_it;
00442         it = iops->init(env, dor, LUDA_64BITHASH);
00443         if (IS_ERR(it)) {
00444                 rc = PTR_ERR(it);
00445                 CERROR("%s: cannot clean PENDING: rc = %d\n",
00446                        mdd2obd_dev(mdd)->obd_name, rc);
00447                 GOTO(out, rc);
00448         }
00449 
00450         rc = iops->load(env, it, 0);
00451         if (rc < 0)
00452                 GOTO(out_put, rc);
00453         if (rc == 0) {
00454                 CERROR("%s: error loading iterator to clean PENDING\n",
00455                        mdd2obd_dev(mdd)->obd_name);
00456                 /* Index contains no zero key? */
00457                 GOTO(out_put, rc = -EIO);
00458         }
00459 
00460         do {
00461                 if (thread->mgt_abort)
00462                         break;
00463 
00464                 key_sz = iops->key_size(env, it);
00465                 /* filter out "." and ".." entries from PENDING dir. */
00466                 if (key_sz < 8)
00467                         goto next;
00468 
00469                 rc = iops->rec(env, it, (struct dt_rec *)ent, LUDA_64BITHASH);
00470                 if (rc != 0) {
00471                         CERROR("%s: fail to get FID for orphan it: rc = %d\n",
00472                                mdd2obd_dev(mdd)->obd_name, rc);
00473                         goto next;
00474                 }
00475 
00476                 fid_le_to_cpu(&fid, &ent->lde_fid);
00477                 if (!fid_is_sane(&fid)) {
00478                         CERROR("%s: bad FID "DFID" cleaning PENDING\n",
00479                                mdd2obd_dev(mdd)->obd_name, PFID(&fid));
00480                         goto next;
00481                 }
00482 
00483                 /* kill orphan object */
00484                 cookie = iops->store(env, it);
00485                 iops->put(env, it);
00486                 rc = orph_key_test_and_del(env, mdd, &fid,
00487                                            (struct dt_key *)ent->lde_name);
00488 
00489                 /* after index delete reset iterator */
00490                 if (rc == 0)
00491                         rc = iops->get(env, it, (const void *)"");
00492                 else
00493                         rc = iops->load(env, it, cookie);
00494 next:
00495                 rc = iops->next(env, it);
00496         } while (rc == 0);
00497 
00498         GOTO(out_put, rc = 0);
00499 out_put:
00500         iops->put(env, it);
00501         iops->fini(env, it);
00502 
00503 out:
00504         return rc;
00505 }
00506 
00523 int orph_index_init(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdd_device *mdd)
00524 {
00525         struct lu_fid            fid;
00526         struct dt_object        *d;
00527         int                      rc = 0;
00528 
00529         ENTRY;
00530 
00531         /* create PENDING dir */
00532         fid_zero(&fid);
00533         rc = mdd_local_file_create(env, mdd, &mdd->mdd_local_root_fid,
00534                                    orph_index_name, S_IFDIR | S_IRUGO |
00535                                    S_IWUSR | S_IXUGO, &fid);
00536         if (rc < 0)
00537                 RETURN(rc);
00538 
00539         d = dt_locate(env, mdd->mdd_child, &fid);
00540         if (IS_ERR(d))
00541                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(d));
00542         LASSERT(lu_object_exists(&d->do_lu));
00543         if (!dt_try_as_dir(env, d)) {
00544                 CERROR("%s: \"%s\" is not an index: rc = %d\n",
00545                        mdd2obd_dev(mdd)->obd_name, orph_index_name, rc);
00546                 lu_object_put(env, &d->do_lu);
00547                 RETURN(-ENOTDIR);
00548         }
00549         mdd->mdd_orphans = d;
00550         RETURN(0);
00551 }
00552 
00553 void orph_index_fini(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdd_device *mdd)
00554 {
00555         ENTRY;
00556         if (mdd->mdd_orphans != NULL) {
00557                 lu_object_put(env, &mdd->mdd_orphans->do_lu);
00558                 mdd->mdd_orphans = NULL;
00559         }
00560         EXIT;
00561 }
00562 
00563 static int __mdd_orphan_cleanup(void *args)
00564 {
00565         struct mdd_generic_thread *thread = (struct mdd_generic_thread *)args;
00566         struct lu_env             *env = NULL;
00567         int                        rc;
00568         ENTRY;
00569 
00570         complete(&thread->mgt_started);
00571 
00572         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(env);
00573         if (env == NULL)
00574                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00575 
00576         rc = lu_env_init(env, LCT_MD_THREAD);
00577         if (rc)
00578                 GOTO(out, rc);
00579 
00580         rc = orph_index_iterate(env, thread);
00581 
00582         lu_env_fini(env);
00583         GOTO(out, rc);
00584 out:
00585         if (env)
00586                 OBD_FREE_PTR(env);
00587         complete(&thread->mgt_finished);
00588         return rc;
00589 }
00590 
00595 int mdd_orphan_cleanup(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdd_device *d)
00596 {
00597         int rc = -ENOMEM;
00598         char *name = NULL;
00599 
00600         OBD_ALLOC(name, MTI_NAME_MAXLEN);
00601         if (name == NULL)
00602                 goto out;
00603 
00604         snprintf(name, MTI_NAME_MAXLEN, "orph_cleanup_%s",
00605                  mdd2obd_dev(d)->obd_name);
00606 
00607         rc = mdd_generic_thread_start(&d->mdd_orph_cleanup_thread,
00608                                       __mdd_orphan_cleanup, (void *)d, name);
00609 out:
00610         if (rc)
00611                 CERROR("%s: start orphan cleanup thread failed:%d\n",
00612                        mdd2obd_dev(d)->obd_name, rc);
00613         if (name)
00614                 OBD_FREE(name, MTI_NAME_MAXLEN);
00615         return rc;
00616 }
00617 
00628 int __mdd_orphan_add(const struct lu_env *env,
00629                      struct mdd_object *obj, struct thandle *th)
00630 {
00631         return orph_index_insert(env, obj, ORPH_OP_UNLINK, th);
00632 }
00633 
00644 int __mdd_orphan_del(const struct lu_env *env,
00645                      struct mdd_object *obj, struct thandle *th)
00646 {
00647         return orph_index_delete(env, obj, ORPH_OP_UNLINK, th);
00648 }
